meanings.sent1: My mom is undergoing chemo to fight cancer.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended chemo as part of the treatment plan.
meanings.sent3: The chemo treatment made my hair fall out, but at least I can rock some cool hats now.
meanings.sent4: To me, chemo is like a brave soldier fighting the battle against illness.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the chemo room was sterile and intimidating, but it was a place of hope and healing.

meanings.definition: A prefix meaning chemical or chemistry.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of chemo on different substances.
meanings.sent2: In chemistry class, we learned about various chemo compounds.
meanings.sent3: Mixing the wrong chemo elements together could result in a big explosion!
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was like a magical chemo potion that turned ordinary ingredients into delicious meals.
meanings.sent5: The power of chemo reactions can be both fascinating and dangerous if not handled properly.
